title: Google Stadia's E3 Plan - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.03.19
description:
Start your trial month for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get 74% off the Father's Day Steak fix gift package at http://omahasteaks.com and enter code: KFGAMES in the search bar.

Tim and Greg wrestle with what Google Stadia's showing Thursday -- including the launch deets and price!

Time stamps - 
00:05:55 - Housekeeping
Happy Pride Month!
We Have Cool Friends Debuts today! youtube.com/kindafunny - Devon Sawa
Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase - Monday, June 10th @ 4:30 p.m. PT 60+ indie games. youtube.com/kindfunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:50 - Google Stadia E3 Conference Thursday!
00:24:00 - BREAKING NEWS: Apple TV will support PS4 & XBox Controllers
00:24:12 - Bethesda Knew Fallout 76 “Would Have Bumps,” James O’Connor @ VG247
00:38:52 - Cuphead comes to Teslas, Ryan McCaffrey @ IGN
00:43:32 - Blood & Truth tops the UK Charts (First VR game to do so) - Christopher Dring @ GIB
00:45:40 - Minecraft Story Mode Going Bye-Bye, Minecraft.net
00:51:20 - Out today
00:48:25 -  Hims
00:49:35 - Omaha Steaks
Reader mail   -
00:53:55 - So I am hyped for all the surprises coming from the conferences, this is our super bowl, but I don't want to know the big surprises I want to know if there are any indie games you want to be announced? - RichardThebat
00:57:00 - With Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3 being a Nintendo exclusive, what’s your thoughts of Nintendo characters being playable? - Nerdcadet
00:58:18 - What you are expecting from tomorrow's Pokémon Direct? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
01:00:50 - Squad Up: Craig Robertson(PSN) - Abseith
01:01:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Andrea
